event.description: Austin Jackson walks.
Ramon Santiago singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nelson Cruz. Austin Jackson to 2nd.

Miguel Cabrera grounds out to first baseman Mitch Moreland. Austin Jackson to 3rd. Ramon Santiago to 2nd.

Ryan Raburn walks.
Jhonny Peralta flies out to center fielder Josh Hamilton.

Austin Jackson walks. Ryan Raburn to 3rd. Brandon Inge to 2nd.
